lead_paragraph: As the shadow of the Nazi legions stretches further southeastward into Asia the 400,000,000 people of India begin to receive attention. More than two months ago Mr. Churchill indicated that the Atlantic Charter did not apply to them. Last week the Indian Council of State declared that this point of view was "likely to prejudice the war efforts of India at this critical juncture."
